1.content: Research real Brexit consultants for each city
1.details: Find actual Brexit compliance consultants in: Edinburgh, London, Cardiff, Belfast, Birmingham, and Manchester. Gather their business names, consultant names, specializations, experience levels, team sizes, and contact information.

2.content: Update database with real consultant data
2.details: Replace the fictitious consultant records in the Supabase database with real consultant information, maintaining the same data structure and ensuring consistency with the existing schema.

3.details: Ensure the new real consultant data displays correctly on the homepage featured section and in the full directory, with proper formatting and all fields populated.

4.details: Execute full Playwright test suite including: homepage functionality, directory search and filtering, consultant profiles, contact forms, and payment flows to ensure no regressions after data updates.
